name: Ghostship Chronicles
description:
Prepare for the Fight of your life with our fun and challenging Sci-Fi first person and third person shooter. Fun, horror and lots of enemies await aboard the Ghostship with random loot, enemies, and challenges.


Ghostship Chronicles is a single player Sci-Fi FPS/TPS which features hordes of enemies, numerous game modes and lots of spooky fun as you fight for your life on board the Ghostship.

Key features:

- Single player campaign with random elements and lots of replayability.
- Skirmish mode for instant challenging action
- First & Third person view
- Random Loot in every Locker
- Random Enemies for Unique and Challenging gameplay
- Special ability – Devastation (area of effect) ability of the player
- Unique Futuristic weapons and Grenades
- Many different types of enemies including zombies, Aliens, Infected and armed foes.
- Atmospheric Visuals and sound
- Full FPS controls, Crouch, Jump Sprint etc.

"WARNING! This game features flashing lights and lots of blood and guts!*
